name: Chopper Invaders
description:
A game made in a day for the Kenney Jam with the theme of Rotation.

Rotate your controller or keyboards keys to control your helecopter propellors to steer while fighting off an alien invasion.

Controller highly recommended for game but keyboard works too. Controller does not work with ui though due to time constraints.

PLEASE LOOK AT TUTORIAL PAGE FOR CONTROLS

Thanks for playing!
